caption.p: Main compounds (>3%) of the essential oils obtained by hydrodistillation from T. montanum, T. capitatum and T. flavum reported in the literature.

fn.p: ap = aerial parts; fl = flowers; lv = leaves. MH = monoterpene hydrocarbons; OM = oxygenated monoterpenes; SH = sesquiterpene hydrocarbons; OS = oxygenated sesquiterpenes; O = others.
